<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/eth2/publicKeys"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a hex-encoded list of BLS public keys for the private keys that have been loaded into Remote Signer.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}

>
